data.text:
Day off――I had a lot of free time on my hands for once, 
so I was about to head out to the station when...
data.processed:
<story>Day off――I had a lot of free time on my hands for once, 
<story>so I was about to head out to the station when...

data.text: Oh, you're going out too?
data.processed: <story>Oh, you're going out too?

data.text: Yo!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Yo!

data.text: Suddenly, Mr. C.B. fell from the tree...!
data.processed: <story>Suddenly, Mr. C.B. fell from the tree...!

data.text:
It's a beautiful day, a perfect day to go out. 
Where are you going?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I was thinking the station... and you?

data.processed:
<story>It's a beautiful day, a perfect day to go out. 
<story>Where are you going?

data.text: Me? I'm――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Me? I'm――

data.text: At that moment, I suddenly remembered what happened before.
data.processed: <story>At that moment, I suddenly remembered what happened before.

data.text:
Mr. C.B. searched for a place to get in the mood for singing lessons. 
EVerywhere she went, I felt like I got a glimpse of her sensibility――
data.processed:
<story>Mr. C.B. searched for a place to get in the mood for singing lessons. 
<story>EVerywhere she went, I felt like I got a glimpse of her sensibility――

data.text:
Maybe today I can understand her thoughts 
that I couldn't at the time!

choices.text: I'll try guessing where you're going!

data.processed:
<story>Maybe today I can understand her thoughts 
<story>that I couldn't at the time!

data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Eh...?

data.text:
...Hahaha! That's funny! 
Yeah, try guessing then!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...Hahaha! That's funny! 
<story>Yeah, try guessing then!

data.text:
Thus, we decided to play a quiz game 
to guess Mr. C.B.'s destination...!
data.processed:
<story>Thus, we decided to play a quiz game 
<story>to guess Mr. C.B.'s destination...!

data.text:
Ahaha! Oh no! 
I went the wrong way!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Oh no! 
<story>I went the wrong way!

data.text:
I'll have to learn how to drive from 
Maruzensky next time. But it was fun!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'll have to learn how to drive from 
<story>Maruzensky next time. But it was fun!

data.text:
I got unexpected souvenirs and even snacks! 
I haven't had a sour-flavored snack candy in a long time!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I got unexpected souvenirs and even snacks! 
<story>I haven't had a sour-flavored snack candy in a long time!

data.text:
A game center where you can enjoy an extraordinary experience. 
She seems to be enjoying herself wholeheartedly. 
In other words, this is the place to be――!
data.processed:
<story>A game center where you can enjoy an extraordinary experience. 
<story>She seems to be enjoying herself wholeheartedly. 
<story>In other words, this is the place to be――!

data.text:
Just too bad it's not here. 
But the idea's not bad, right?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Just too bad it's not here. 
<story>But the idea's not bad, right?

data.text:
Here's a hint! I was bored, 
so I thought I'd have some fun.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Here's a hint! I was bored, 
<story>so I thought I'd have some fun.

data.text:
Phew, that was a lot of walking! 
The giant maze was quite fun!
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I can't believe we had to walk through it all...
choices.processed: <size=36>I can't believe we had to walk through it all...</size>

data.processed:
<story>Phew, that was a lot of walking! 
<story>The giant maze was quite fun!

data.text:
You're curious about the paths you didn't choose, right? 
Thanks to that, I saw all the figures at the dead end!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>You're curious about the paths you didn't choose, right? 
<story>Thanks to that, I saw all the figures at the dead end!

data.text:
Hey, let's go free-falling next time. It's a plunge from the top! 
It's a view you can only experience if you become a hawk!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Hey, let's go free-falling next time. It's a plunge from the top! 
<story>It's a view you can only experience if you become a hawk!

data.text:
She seemed to be enjoying the amusement park. 
I was feeling the impact of her joy, but――
data.processed:
<story>She seemed to be enjoying the amusement park. 
<story>I was feeling the impact of her joy, but――

data.text: Hm? No, you missed!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Hm? No, you missed!

data.text:
Now, what shall we do? 
Where will you take us next? Ahaha!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Now, what shall we do? 
<story>Where will you take us next? Ahaha!

data.text:
Well, one more hint! 
It's not too far away.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Well, one more hint! 
<story>It's not too far away.

data.text: Thanks for the meal~!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Thanks for the meal~!

data.text:
I knew it, the croquettes here are delicious. 
I sometimes buy them and eat them at home with some yuzu koshō.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I knew it, the croquettes here are delicious. 
<story>I sometimes buy them and eat them at home with some yuzu koshō.

data.text:
Yeah, it's a bit tangy but refreshing... also... 
You have croquette batter all over your mouth! Ahaha!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, it's a bit tangy but refreshing... also... 
<story>You have croquette batter all over your mouth! Ahaha!

data.text:
Wiping my mouth hurriedly, I confirmed it by looking at her 
enjoying herself. It's close to the academy, where you can enjoy 
shopping, eating and socializing with people.
data.processed:
<story>Wiping my mouth hurriedly, I confirmed it by looking at her 
<story>enjoying herself. It's close to the academy, where you can enjoy 
<story>shopping, eating and socializing with people.

data.text: ...It's not.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...It's not.

data.text:
I missed. In the end, I couldn't take her 
to the place she wanted.
data.processed:
<story>I missed. In the end, I couldn't take her 
<story>to the place she wanted.

data.text:
Don't be so gloomy. 
It was fun, you know?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: But, you wanted to go somewhere right?
choices.processed: <size=40>But, you wanted to go somewhere right?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Don't be so gloomy. 
<story>It was fun, you know?

data.text:
Ahaha... I guess I would feel bad 
if that was bothering you.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha... I guess I would feel bad 
<story>if that was bothering you.

data.text: ...Well, let me take you to the right place.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...Well, let me take you to the right place.

data.text:
I followed Mr. C.B. back to the school gate 
where we first met.
data.processed:
<story>I followed Mr. C.B. back to the school gate 
<story>where we first met.

data.text: This is the right answer.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>This is the right answer.

data.text:
I didn't have a specific place in mind. 
I just came out aimlessly.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I didn't have a specific place in mind. 
<story>I just came out aimlessly.

data.text:
I was looking from the top of the tree and wondering 
where could I find something interesting.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I was looking from the top of the tree and wondering 
<story>where could I find something interesting.

data.text: Then you came.
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: Then, there was no right answer...?

data.processed: <story>Then you came.

data.text:
No, you were "right". 
You started saying interesting things.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>No, you were "right". 
<story>You started saying interesting things.

data.text:
It's been fun following you as you thought hard, 
I had a great time playing with you where we went!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>It's been fun following you as you thought hard, 
<story>I had a great time playing with you where we went!

data.text: I wanted to have a fun time and you fulfilled my desire.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>I wanted to have a fun time and you fulfilled my desire.

data.text: So, the place where I met you is the right place!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>So, the place where I met you is the right place!

data.text: ...Convinced now?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...Convinced now?

data.text:
Ahaha! Actually, I think so as well! 
But, you know, let's do this again next time, 
a quiz to guess where are we going!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! Actually, I think so as well! 
<story>But, you know, let's do this again next time, 
<story>a quiz to guess where are we going!

data.text:
I was both exhausted but relieved, that I was able 
to properly entertain Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I was both exhausted but relieved, that I was able 
<story>to properly entertain Mr. C.B.

data.text: She is a free spirit, and yet she isn't so easy to deal with.
data.processed: <story>She is a free spirit, and yet she isn't so easy to deal with.

title: Impossible, if I may put it that way
